about_the_game:
Meat Grinder is a Mech-themed shooting game where players can drive and assemble their own mechs to battle fierce dinosaurs from outer space.

Game Features:
*You can use quantum technology to transform the volume and mass of any unit to aid in battle.
* Battle multiple mutated dinosaurs.
* You can utilize the meat grinder to recycle any corpse and battlefield resources to replenish mechs and gain additional gains.
* You can use different components to assemble your own mech at will.
* You can switch angles in battle to enjoy a different Mecha driving experience.
* Features vintage poster art style.

Game mode:
* Level Mode: Travel to different locations and complete a combat mission as time passes.
* Endless Mode: Defeat waves of invading enemies while receiving random equipment and supplies to constantly arm the Mechs until the last moment.

In the game, you need to flexibly utilize quantum technology to change the size and mass of the mech itself and the enemy to kill the enemy more easily, and at the same time, use the meat grinder to recycle the corpses and battlefield resources to achieve the purpose of sustainable combat. As the war progresses, you will face more dangerous enemies, more complex weather and environment, and grow up with your mechs in the constant battle.

content_descriptors.notes: There are a lot of animal blood effects in the game.

detailed_description:
Meat Grinder is a Mech-themed shooting game where players can drive and assemble their own mechs to battle fierce dinosaurs from outer space.

Game Features:
*You can use quantum technology to transform the volume and mass of any unit to aid in battle.

* You can use different components to assemble your own mech at will.

* Features vintage poster art style.

Game mode:
* Level Mode: Travel to different locations and complete a combat mission as time passes.
* Endless Mode: Defeat waves of invading enemies while receiving random equipment and supplies to constantly arm the Mechs until the last moment.

In the game, you need to flexibly utilize quantum technology to change the size and mass of the mech itself and the enemy to kill the enemy more easily, and at the same time, use the meat grinder to recycle the corpses and battlefield resources to achieve the purpose of sustainable combat. As the war progresses, you will face more dangerous enemies, more complex weather and environment, and grow up with your mechs in the constant battle.
name: Meatgrinder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon HD 6670 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 / AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: MeatGrinder is a mech-shooter themed shooter where you have to pilot and assemble your own mech on a desert planet to fight against ferocious dinosaurs from outer space.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, French, German, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
